edu.nyu.cs.javagit.api
Class DotGit

java.lang.Object
  edu.nyu.cs.javagit.api.DotGit

public final class DotGit
extends java.lang.Object

The DotGit represents the .git directory.

deleteBranch

public void deleteBranch(Ref branch,
                         boolean forceDelete)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         JavaGitException
Deletes a branch

Parameters:
branch - The branch to delete
forceDelete - True if force delete option -D should be used, false if -d should be used.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Thrown in case of I/O operation failure
JavaGitException - Thrown when there is an error executing git-branch.

                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        JavaGitException
Renames a branch

Parameters:
branchFrom - The branch to rename
nameTo - New branch name
forceRename - True if force rename option -M should be used. False if -m should be used.
Returns:
new Ref instance
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Thrown in case of I/O operation failure
JavaGitException - Thrown when there is an error executing git-branch.
